AppicationSubmissionInfo.FormAndInfoAndMaterials: At this time, contributions and grants are made only to public charitable organizations as described in IRC Sections 509(a)(1), (2) and (3).

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1: New York Studio School of Drawing Painting and Sculpture

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExemptPrps.RelationshipStatement: Lines 4 and 8 - The Foundation's purpose is to receive, administer and distribute funds for scientific, educational, religious and other charitable purposes within the meaning of IRC Sec 501(c)(3). The income received from investments in the form of interest, dividends and capital gains from the sale of investments allows the Foundation to carry out this mission. Amounts which are not currently distributed accumulate for distribution in future years.
